page.title: 07ASTWOOD BANK FACTORIES
page.content: One of the factories visited was the J.H.Yeomans spring factory,it is a large establishment which was founded in 1921 by J.H.Yeomans,but,was moved to its present site (on the Evesham Road) in 1926.It has always been a family business and has always been controlled by descendents of J.H.Yeomans.J.H.Yeomans make springs for all sorts of products like beds but mostly for cars and tractors.It has a comprehensive range of test equipment with a strict application of quality control methods which ensures that our components meet customer's requirements.Quality levels are further supported by having our own toolroom and heat treatment shops.The whole building is very large.Itis about 28,000 sq.feet.There are 60 people employed.
